mapper.select: select frontid,loginname as loginName,loginpwd,realname as realName,nickname as nickName,picpath as picPath,cardno,mobilephone as mobilePhone,email,user_status as userStatus,user_desc as userDesc from front_user where loginname=#{loginname} and loginpwd=#{loginpwd}
mapper.update: update front_user set user_status='1' where frontid=#{num}
mapper.select: select frontid from front_user where openid=#{openid}
